choices.title: Digital
choices.description: Projection on our Christie CP2210 digital projector for cinema style showing of Blu-ray, DVD, or rented hard drives from providers such as Swank or Criterion Pictures.

choices.title: 16mm
choices.description: Showing of older style film such as cartoons or MOSFETs. Can be shown outside of Fuller Upper; please contact us for details.

choices.title: 35mm
choices.description: Showing of optical 35mm film in Fuller Upper, rented from a provider such as Swank or Criterion Pictures.

choices.title: 70mm
choices.description: Showing of magnetic 70mm film in Fuller Upper, rented from a provider such as Swank or Criterion Pictures.
